دعا برای ترامپ جنجال به پا کرد+عکس

02 Nov 2019, 00:26


رهبران انجیلی آمریکا صبح امروز در اتاق روزولت کاخ سفید با دونالد ترامپ رئیس جمهور آمریکا دیدار و برای وی دعا کرده اند.


آفتاب‌‌نیوز :

جود دیر دبیر مطبوعاتی کاخ سفید در بیانیه اعلام کرد که روز سه شنبه رئیس جمهور آمریکا در جلسه ای غیر رسمی با رهبران مذهبی آمریکا دیدار داشته است.
این در حالی است که تصویری که از کاخ سفید منتشر شده است با واکنش شدید کاربران فضای مجازی مواجه شده است و ترامپ را یک نژاد پرست تمام عیار خوانده اند.



کانال تلگرامی توئیت پرس در تکمیل این خبر نوشت: عده‌ای از برجستگان محافظه‌کار مسیحی و انجیلی، این هفته در کاخ سفید با ترامپ به طور غیر رسمی ملاقات کرده و جلسه‌ای خودمانی برگزار کردند.
معاون مطبوعاتی کاخ سفید بعدا گفت رهبران مذهبی صبح سه شنبه با ترامپ دیدار کرده و برای وی دعا کردند.
به گفته «جود دیر» آنها برای ترامپ و ملت آمریکا دعا کردند.
گفته می‌شود در این جلسه موضوعاتی مانند اصلاح قانون کیفری، دفاع از آزادی مذهبی، کاهش سقط جنین، مبارزه با بحران مواد مخدر و قاچاق مواد مخدر و پایان داعش و البغدادی مورد بحث قرار گرفت.

Officially .. Accept the files of 5 presidential candidates in Algeria
02 Nov 2019 by Mona Ghanmi
Algeria's electoral regulator announced on Saturday the final list of candidates for the presidential election, expected to be held on December 12, to accept the files of five presidential candidates, explained Mohamed Charafi, President of the Commission to accept the files of Najd Izzedine Mihoubi, Taboun and Abdelaziz Belaid to run for president.
It is noteworthy that 22 candidates submitted their files last week to the Independent National Authority for Elections, to decide on the extent of meeting all the conditions that qualify its holder to run in the elections, as the body responsible for organizing and monitoring the elections after this task was entrusted to the Ministry of Interior, to be announced in the hours Next names will compete on the chair after less than a month and a half.
The announcement of the Commission was not surprising, as it was likely that the final list of candidates for the presidential race and entry to the Palace of Muradia five names mentioned, which succeeded in collecting the necessary signatures for the nomination (50,000 signatures).
Faces calculated on the Bouteflika system
It is noteworthy that most of the candidates of the faces affiliated with the regime of former President Abdelaziz Bouteflika.
Ezzedine Mihoubi, 60, acting secretary-general of the imprisoned National Democratic Party (RND), Ahmed Ouyahia, served as Minister of Culture in a government formed by Bouteflika (2017 to 2019) and as Minister of Communication between 2008 and 2010.
Former Prime Minister Abdelmajid Tebboun, 73, is one of the most important pillars of Bouteflika's reign and has held several senior positions during his tenure, including the Minister of Housing, which lasted for seven years.



From the demonstrations in Algeria Friday
The head of the Vanguard Party, Ali Benflis, 75, served as prime minister between 2000 and 2003 during Bouteflika's first term, before sacking him after major disagreements, becoming an opponent and rival in the presidential election.
Abdelaziz Belaid, 56, holds the presidency of the Future Party. President Abdelaziz Bouteflika competed in the 2014 elections and received only 3.3 percent of the vote.
Abdelkader Ben Kreina, 57, head of the National Building Party (a breakaway party from the Algerian Brotherhood's central party), is backed by Islamists in Algeria. He had previously run for the April 18, 2019 elections, which triggered the popular movement after Bouteflika was nominated for a fifth term before being canceled and forced to resign under pressure from the protests.
